Hi Michelle I'm a huge supporter. I love your work and always appreciate your dedication to what you do. However the message to all is the stayhome when only essential like getting medical treatment getting groceries picking up prescription etc. With the risk of exposure for you both or others during the travel or the transportation to get to the office or contact with each other with handling objects and touching things in the office it is best to not have collabs. I really appreciate your hard work in putting this together I love love love it Thank you for providing us with your creativity and entertainment during these times. I'm also concerned about hospitals not being fully equipped with proper face protection and gear for the Frontline. I think if there's ways to help your hospital get donations that will be awesome. Even in Canada there will soon be low supply and we're trying to find ways for people to donate and help when they can  Love from Toronto
